Articles.Content: Mostly aimed at modders and the devs, but it would be nice for some tutorial missions explaining how to rendezvous and dock, now while you can watch vids on youtube showing you how, I think it's best you do it yourself in a step by step tutorial. Agree? Disagree?

It would be quite nice to have them as part of the base game, yes.

Until then, one of the written tutorials in the Drawing Board actually has a trainer ship designed to be used along with it, so you could practice with that one if you're having trouble.
